forYou.__comment: Copy for 'Ballie For You' consumer module
forYou.title: Where football brings people together
paragraphs: Born from a passion for the beautiful game, Ballie Live is the platform for everyone who doesn't just want to watch football but truly experience it.Whether you're at home, at the pub with friends, or on the go, Ballie Live brings fans, clubs, and venues together in one app.

Find where your favourite club is playing live, follow matches in real time, and discover places where football comes alive. And while you explore and interact, you can earn Ballie Coins through daily logins, sharing on socials or inviting a friend.
Ballie Live connects people through their shared love for football and brings stadium energy straight to your screen - anytime, anywhere.

business.__comment: Copy for 'Ballie For Business' venue-owner module
business.title: Where football fills your venue
paragraphs: Where the passion for football begins, Ballie Live brings people together - at your place.
With a free Ballie Live Business account, your bar, cafe, or sports venue becomes visible to thousands of football fans looking for the perfect spot to cheer together.
Show which matches you're broadcasting - Ballie Live takes care of the rest.
Turn every match into an opportunity for a full house.

coins.__comment: Copy for Ballie Coins benefits module
coins.title: Ballie Coins - Earn. Personalise. Experience.
paragraphs: With Ballie Coins, you get more out of your football experience.
Earn Coins through daily logins, sharing on socials or inviting a friend.
Use your Ballie Coins to personalise your Ballie Live profile, unlock discounts on football gear, or buy extras for the upcoming Ballie Live Game.
Ballie Live becomes your playground - where football never stops.

footballMaps.title: FootballMaps - Find where football lives
paragraphs: With FootballMaps from Ballie Live, you always know where the match is on.
Discover bars, cafes, and venues near you that show live football - from local derbies to international clashes.
See which matches are playing, check reviews, and choose the perfect spot to watch.
Are you a venue owner? Sign up for free with Ballie Live For Business and make your location discoverable to fans.

liveScores.title: Live Scores - Stay in the game
paragraphs: With Live Scores from Ballie Live, you never miss a moment.
Follow every match in real time, see instantly who scores or takes the lead - all in one clean overview.
Wherever you are, Ballie Live keeps you connected to the game.

blogsNews.__comment: Copy for Blogs & News content module
blogsNews.title: Blogs & News – Stories, updates & highlights
paragraphs: Dive into stories that bring the football world closer — from tactical breakdowns and club news to behind-the-scenes features on fans and venues.
Stay up to date with match previews, reactions and curated content tailored to what you follow in Ballie Live.
Whether you’ve got five minutes or a full evening, Blogs & News keeps you in the loop between kick-offs.
